title: Frozen Crown
summaries: The Frozen Crown is a pet-summoning item that has a 1/8 (12.5%) to 1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Ice Queen in Master Mode. It summons a miniature Ice Queen pet that will follow the player around.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a tiny Ice Queen
'Fit for a queen!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
